com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast

Class TypeInterestBroadcaster<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.AbstractBroadcaster
      • com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.TypeInterestBroadcaster<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The expected broadcastable type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Broadcaster, InterestBroadcaster<T>

    public final class TypeInterestBroadcaster<T>
extends AbstractBroadcaster
implements InterestBroadcaster<T>
    An InterestBroadcaster that is interested in all broadcasts of a particular type.

    This is similar to QueryableBroadcaster except this only collects instances a single type, and as such should be preferred when possible.
